vb.classbody.text:
Public contents As String
    Public Sub New(_file As String)
        If File.Exists(_file) Then
            Dim file As New StreamReader(_file)
            contents = file.ReadToEnd()
            file.Close()
        End If
    End Sub

vb.class.text:
Public Class readFile
    Public contents As String
    Public Sub New(_file As String)
        If File.Exists(_file) Then
            Dim file As New StreamReader(_file)
            contents = file.ReadToEnd()
            file.Close()
        End If
    End Sub
End Class

vb.classes.text:
Imports System.IO

Public Class readFile
    Public contents As String
    Public Sub New(_file As String)
        If File.Exists(_file) Then
            Dim file As New StreamReader(_file)
            contents = file.ReadToEnd()
            file.Close()
        End If
    End Sub
End Class
